content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case involving a claimant represented by a state legal aid lawyer and two defendants the claimant is seeking to terminate a community inheritance and divide the inheritance the case was heard in the tartu county court in estonia and lasted for four months the court issued a decision in favor of the republic of estonia ordering the defendants to pay the procedural costs of €55277 the judgment is immediately enforceable and the defendants are jointly and severally responsible for the costs the estate of ts will sell a property through a public auction and the proceeds will be divided among the parties involved the defendants have the right to submit an appeal to the tartu county court the text also explains the process of determining procedural costs and the exemption of the claimant from bearing these costs the court granted state legal aid to the claimant and ordered the defendants to cover the procedural costs the court recognized the decision and it can be enforced immediately
